title: Material Palette King
description: Material Palette King - The king of material editing
longDescription:
Material Palette is a powerful plugin designed to enhance the Material Editor in Unreal. It not only extends the basic functionalities of the material editor, such as storing material node snippets, batch replacement of material functions, batch setting of material variable names, grouping settings, and optimizing sorting priorities but also adds the ability to show or hide pin names. Users can choose to display or hide all bubble comments for better node management. Furthermore, Material Palette enhances the right-click context menu of material nodes with additional commands, thus further improving the plugin's usability. Customizable shortcut keys allow the editor to adapt to the user's workflow, and the plugin's functionalities can be extended through Blueprints, offering a more personalized material editing experience.


Version:

V1.0.3

Fix the issue of packaging failure.

V1.0.2

Updated the function of adding MaterialX nodes.

V1.0.1

Add the function to batch change the color of the renamed reroute nodes.

V1.0.0

Release the plugin.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Storing material node snippets.
  • Batch replacement of material functions.
  • Batch setting of material variable names.
  • Batch grouping settings.
  • Batch optimizing sorting priorities.
  • Add or remove mask pin.
  • Show or hide pin name.
  • Show or hide all bubble comments.
  • Material node right-click menu command expansion.
  • Customize function shortcuts.
  • Expand the plugin function through the blueprint.
